metadata.Title: SoilTemperature
metadata.Extended description: APSIMâ€™s SoilTemperature component computes heat fluxes and soil temperature profiles using a 1D finite-difference scheme coupled to atmospheric boundary layer conductance and net radiation estimates. It accounts for soil physical properties (texture, bulk density, organic matter, rocks), water content, radiative and sensible/latent heat fluxes, and diurnal forcing. Based on Campbell (1985).
metadata.Short description: Heat flux and temperatures over the surface and soil profile (based on Campbell, 1985).
